points.title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

case.title: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions
case.localized_title: Ce service utilise des cookies de tiers, mais avec des instructions d'exclusion.

points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

case.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
case.localized_title: Le fournisseur de services ne garantit pas un service ininterrompu, opportun, sûr ou exempt d'erreurs.
case.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

case.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
case.localized_title: Vous avez le droit de quitter ce service à tout moment
case.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

points.title: This service does not sell your personal data

case.title: Your personal data is not sold
case.localized_title: Ce service ne vend pas vos données personnelles
case.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.

points.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Ce service utilise des cookies de tiers pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

case.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
case.localized_title: Ce service est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation individuelle et non commerciale.
case.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.

points.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Le service peut utiliser des pixels de suivi, des balises web, des empreintes de navigateur et/ou des empreintes d'appareil pour les utilisateurs.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice

case.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
case.localized_title: Le service peut supprimer un contenu spécifique sans raison et peut le faire sans préavis
case.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.

points.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

case.title: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason
case.localized_title: Le service peut supprimer votre compte sans préavis et sans raison.
case.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

points.title: They may stop providing the service at any time

case.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
case.localized_title: Ils peuvent cesser de fournir le service à tout moment
case.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.

points.title: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself

case.title: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself
case.localized_title: Si vous êtes la cible d'un avis de retrait de la part d'un détenteur de droits d'auteur, ce service vous donne la possibilité de vous défendre.
case.description: You have the right to send a counter-notice to the service if you believe the content that was removed wasn't infringing any copyright.

points.title: The service provides a free help desk

case.title: A free help desk is provided
case.localized_title: Le service propose un service d'assistance gratuit
case.description: The service can be easily contacted for questions or provides a support center at no extra cost.

points.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.localized_title: Le blocage des cookies peut limiter votre capacité à utiliser le service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

points.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service n'est accessible qu'aux utilisateurs d'un certain âge.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

case.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez refuser la publicité ciblée
case.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

case.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
case.localized_title: Ce service peut collecter, utiliser et partager des données de localisation
case.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

case.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
case.localized_title: Le service est fourni "en l'état" et doit être utilisé aux seuls risques des utilisateurs.
case.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des conditions.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

case.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
case.localized_title: Des tiers peuvent être impliqués dans l'exploitation du service

points.title: This service can delete your content if you violate the terms

case.title: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms
case.localized_title: Ce service peut supprimer votre contenu si vous ne respectez pas les conditions d'utilisation.
case.description: Content infringing the Terms of Service (or the Acceptable Use Policy or equivalent)  may be removed, with or without notice.

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

case.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
case.localized_title: Vos données peuvent être traitées et stockées partout dans le monde
case.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.

points.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

case.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
case.localized_title: Ce service peut utiliser vos informations personnelles à des fins de marketing
case.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.

points.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance

case.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance
case.localized_title: Lorsque le service souhaite apporter une modification substantielle à ses conditions, les utilisateurs en sont informés au moins 30 jours à l'avance.
case.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified at least 30 days in advance.

points.title: You maintain ownership of your data

case.title: You maintain ownership of your content
case.localized_title: Vous restez propriétaire de vos données
case.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.

points.title: This service can license user content to third parties
points.analysis: "However, by submitting Content to Waze, you hereby grant Waze and the users of the Service an irrevocable, worldwide, perpetual, non-exclusive, royalty-free, sub-licenseable and transferable license"

case.title: Your content can be licensed to third parties
case.localized_title: Ce service peut concéder des licences sur le contenu des utilisateurs à des tiers
case.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.

points.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

case.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
case.localized_title: Le service propose un mécanisme de réclamation pour le traitement des données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.

points.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
points.analysis: "If you believe that certain content, which appears on Waze real-time road maps (the "Service"), infringes upon copyrights that you own or represent, you may send Waze's designated copyright agent ("Copyright Agent") a written notification[...] Upon your notification, Waze may remove or disable access to any such content."

case.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
case.localized_title: Si vous faites l'objet d'une revendication de droits d'auteur, votre contenu peut être supprimé
case.description: The content you have published on the service may be removed if it infringes copyright.

points.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
points.analysis: "However, by submitting Content to Waze, you hereby grant Waze and the users of the Service an irrevocable, worldwide, perpetual, non-exclusive, royalty-free, sub-licenseable and transferable license"

case.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
case.localized_title: Le service dispose d'une utilisation non exclusive de votre contenu
case.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.

points.title: This service keeps a license on user-generated content even after users close their accounts.
points.analysis: "However, by submitting Content to Waze, you hereby grant Waze and the users of the Service an irrevocable, worldwide, perpetual, non-exclusive, royalty-free, sub-licenseable and transferable license"

case.title: A license is kept on user-generated content even after you close your account
case.localized_title: Ce service conserve une licence sur les contenus générés par les utilisateurs, même après la fermeture de leur compte.
case.description: The service may still use your content and display it after you stopped using it by closing your account. The case applies to terms requiring users to grant them a perpetual license over that content.

points.title: Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim

case.title: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim
case.localized_title: Fournit des instructions sur la manière de soumettre une demande de droits d'auteur
case.description: If content that you own is copied or made accessible through the service in a way that constitutes an intellectual property right infringement, you can report it following the instructions given in the agreements.

points.title: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.

case.title: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.
case.localized_title: Ce service fournit une liste des tiers impliqués dans son fonctionnement.
case.description: The Service provides a list detailing the third parties involved, their roles, and may even provide more information.

points.title: This service is a subsidiary of Google

case.title: This service is a subsidiary of Company X
case.localized_title: Ce service est une filiale de Google
case.description: The service is a subsidiary of a certain company (called X in the title, to be replaced by the parent Company in each point's title). Company X’s Terms of Service may apply to the service.

points.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

case.title: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
case.localized_title: Il est conseillé aux utilisateurs de consulter régulièrement les conditions d'utilisation, bien qu'en cas de changements importants, le service en informera les utilisateurs.
case.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified.

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

case.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
case.localized_title: Le service ne garantit pas l'exactitude ou la fiabilité des informations fournies
case.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.

points.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

case.title: Pseudonyms are allowed
case.localized_title: Le service vous permet d'utiliser des pseudonymes
case.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.

points.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

case.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
case.localized_title: Vous êtes responsable du maintien de la sécurité de votre compte et des activités qui s'y déroulent
case.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

points.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

case.title: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason
case.localized_title: Le service peut supprimer votre compte sans préavis et sans raison.
case.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

points.title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online

case.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online
case.localized_title: Le service informe les utilisateurs des risques liés à la publication d'informations personnelles en ligne.

points.title: Your profile is combined across various products

case.title: Your profile is combined across various products
case.localized_title: Votre profil est combiné à différents produits
case.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.

points.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

case.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
case.localized_title: Les conditions peuvent être modifiées à tout moment, à leur discrétion, sans préavis.
case.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
